Uses of Class
Model.Country

  • Packages that use Country 
    Package Description
    Model  

    • Uses of Country in Model

      Methods in Model that return Country 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Country Country.createCountryInstanceFromHashMap(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> data)
      Creates an instance of the Country class based on the key-value pairs where the keys are the variable names for an instance of the Country class, and the values are the values that are to be stored in those variable.
      Country City.getCountry() 
      Country AppointmentDatabase.getCountryFromDB(java.lang.String name)
      Retrieves a country from the database if it already exists, OR adds the country to the database if the country does not already exist and returns the new instance of the Country object.
      Country AppointmentDatabase.getCountryWithId(int countryid)
      Allows the user to access an instance of a Country using the countryId value.
      Methods in Model that return types with arguments of type Country 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,Country> AppointmentDatabase.getCountries()
      Returns a HashMap that maps the countryIds to the Country objects.
      Methods in Model with parameters of type Country 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      City AppointmentDatabase.getCityFromDB(java.lang.String name, Country country)
      Retrieves a city from the database if it already exists, OR adds a new row in the City table in the database representing a new city if the city does not already exists and returns a new instance of the City object.
      boolean AppointmentDatabase.removeCountry(Country country)
      Removes a country from the Country table in the database as well as removes the corresponding Country instance from the AppointmentDatabase singleton instance, if and only if the Country is not assigned to a city in the city table of the database.
      void City.setCountryId(Country country)
      Sets the country for the City object in both the object instance and the country id in the database itself.
      Constructors in Model with parameters of type Country 
      Constructor and Description
      City(int id, java.lang.String name, Country country, java.sql.Timestamp createDate, java.lang.String creatorName, java.sql.Timestamp updateDate, java.lang.String updatorName)
      Creates an instance of a City object based on the uCertify database model.
